comments.body:
```
    description: |
        A small python library that can clump lists of data together.
    dev_url: https://github.com/koaning/clumper
    doc_url: https://koaning.github.io/clumper/
```

diffHunk:

comments.body:
Add comment:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/koaning/clumper/pull/59
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

I've opened a PR to fix having to manually package the license file (https://github.com/koaning/clumper/pull/59). The comment is a visual reminder to check the status of whether the license file is in a future release at which point you can delete the comment and the manually packaged copy.
